title: Hacked WordPress sites use visitors' browsers to hack other sites
description: Hackers are conducting widescale attacks on WordPress sites to inject scripts that force visitors' browsers to bruteforce passwords for other sites.  [...]

title: Hackers impersonate U.S. government agencies in BEC attacks
description: A gang of hackers specialized in business email compromise (BEC) attacks and tracked as TA4903 has been impersonating various U.S. government entities to lure targets into opening malicious files carrying links to fake bidding processes. [...]

title: Duvel says it has "more than enough" beer after ransomware attack
description: Duvel Moortgat Brewery was hit by a ransomware attack late last night, bringing to a halt the beer production in the company's bottling facilities [...]

title: Canada's anti-money laundering agency offline after cyberattack
description: The Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC) has announced that a "cyber incident" forced it to take its corporate systems offline as a precaution. [...]

title: VMware fixes critical sandbox escape flaws in ESXi, Workstation, and Fusion
description: VMware released security updates to fix critical sandbox escape vulnerabilities in VMware ESXi, Workstation, Fusion, and Cloud Foundation products, allowing attackers to escape virtual machines and access the host operating system. [...]

title: Hackers target Docker, Hadoop, Redis, Confluence with new Golang malware
description: Hackers are targeting misconfigured servers running Apache Hadoop YARN, Docker, Confluence, or Redis with new Golang-based malware that automates the discovery and compromise of the hosts. [...]
